metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8367 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
The phase_one_correct function in Libraw before 0.17.1 allows attackers tocause memory errors and possibly execute arbitrary code, related to memoryobject initialization.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8367` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.2-1
libraw20 - 0.18.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.2-1').
exactimage package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
